description: Conquer endless terrains with strategic driving in Eggy Car! Balance speed & physics to protect your fragile egg through randomly generated obstacle courses.ðŸš—ðŸ¥š

HomeFeatures.gameTitle: Eggy Car:Crack the Distance, Not the Egg!
HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Eggy Car is a physics-based balance driving game where players must navigate a vehicle carrying a fragile egg through procedurally generated rugged terrain, while protecting the egg from breaking due to bumps, collisions, or falls.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Use Left/Right Arrow Keys or A/D Keys to accelerate/decelerate on PC.Tap the accelerator (right) and brake (left) buttons on the screen on Mobile.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Drive as far as possible on rough terrain and collect coins to unlock new vehicles.Protect the egg from breaking due to bumps, crashes, or falls.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Game ends if the egg breaks!Common causes: High-speed crashes or long falls.
HomeFeatures.Tip1: Slow down on obstacles like steep slopes.Accelerate on flat areas to collect coins faster.
HomeFeatures.Tip2: Adjust vehicle tilt based on upcoming terrain.
HomeFeatures.Tip3: Temporarily stabilizes the egg.Automatically collects nearby coins.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Procedurally generated levels enhance replayability, testing players' real-time reflexes.Infinitely extending tracks motivate players to continually beat their personal records.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Low-strain visual design with cheerful music, suitable for all ages (especially children).Blends entertainment with cognitive skill development through precision driving challenges.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Play instantly on PC/mobile browsers or via Chrome extension â€“ no downloads required.Built with HTML5/WebGL technology to ensure smooth performance across devices.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Engage without limits - Eggy car is completely free!
